title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 30, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 30, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the DP Show, Dan discusses how the NFL plans to handle the spike of Covid cases in the league. Will games have to moved around? We're joined by Pro Football Talk Live Co-host Mike Florio, Clippers beat writer Jovan Buha, and NY Times best selling author Jeff Pearlman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
